name: LinearGraph256
description: The unified attribute for the Linear Graph (256) element.

content.name: x
content.description:
the X position of the element
default: 0.0

content.name: y
content.description:
the Y position of the element
default: 0.0

content.name: scale
content.description:
the scale of the element
default: 1.0

content.name: angle
content.description:
the angle of the element
default: 0.0

content.name: width
content.description:
the width of the element
default: 10.0

content.name: height
content.description:
the height of the element
default: 10.0

content.name: anchor
content.description:
the anchor point of the element
default: {x:0.0, y:0.0}

content.name: thickness
content.description:
the thickness of the graphed line
default: 1.0

content.name: number_of_values_to_use
content.description: the number of values from the "values" array to use when rendering the line
